name: Plugin Name: NextGen Oqey Skins Lite
author: oqeysites.com

sections.description:
NextGen Oqey Skins Lite is a plugin that allow to use oQey Skins on NextGen Gallery.
It process automatically the nextgen gallery tags, slideshow and nggallery running them with the default oQey skin. It work perfect with free and commercial oQey Skins.

Links:

  • Demo Gallery

For more details, skins and examples and flash gallery, please visit oqeysites.com

Features:

  • Allow to use the oqey skins for nextgen gallery
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the plugin archive and put ngg-oqey-skins-lite folder into your plugins directory (wp-content/plugins/)

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. Minimum version 1.0 of the oQey Gallery is required.
sections.faq:
How the plugin work?

It process automatically the nextgen gallery tags, slideshow and nggallery running them with the default oQey skin.
sections.changelog:
=0.3=

  • Stability improvements

=0.2=

  • Compatibility with the latest nextgen gallery.
  • Stability improvements
  • Latest oQey gallery required.

=0.1=

  • The first stable version.
